name: Dark IAM Moodle by GexideL
description: Dark theme for IAM Moodle. If you find any imperfections please write below in discussion.
additional_info: 26. 05. 2020 - Bugfix 1.06 Fixes on the "Osebni izobraževalni načrt" ---------- 04. 03. 2020 - Bugfix 1.05 Fixes on the "create a project" and other minor changes. ---------- 26. 02. 2020 - Bugfix 1.04 Fixes on the "create a project". ---------- 12. 07. 2019 - Bugfix 1.03 Whole site overhaul beacuse of the page changes. ---------- 11. 06. 2019 - Bugfix 1.02 Fixed some elements under projects. ---------- 08. 06. 2019 - Bugfix 1.01 Fixed calendar and adding events. ---------- 08. 05. 2019 - Release 1.00 First release of Dark theme for IAM Moodle.
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://minetsi") {
/* ==UserStyle==
@name         Dark IAM Moodle by GexideL
@description  Dark theme for IAM Moodle
@author       GexideL

==/UserStyle== */

select,
